sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { name = 'Angular'; showMenu = false; toggleNavbar(){ this.showMenu = !this.showMenu; } }
